app.name: Snes9x RX
app.long_description:
Featuring: - MSU-1 audio enhancement chip support. - Retrode 2 USB adapter support. - Wii U Pro Controller support. - Wii U Gamepad controller support through VC injects. - Xbox 360 Controller support (wired) - Screenshot/Cover/Artwork display. Swap between them with the +/Z button! - Classic Controllers support (NES / SNES)
- Sharp / Soft / HQ2X / Scanline filters. - Super FX overclock (20/40/60 MHz). - Wiiflow plugin mode. - FPS counter toggle. - Screenshot button.
